item.description: Let's get together to watch La Princesse de Montpensier, a film by Bernard Tavernier. It's playing in Northampton and looks like a beautiful production. Here is more info on the film: amherstcinema.org/films-and-events/princess-montpensier See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Show is at 7:20 pm, find each other in theater
item.name: Soiree Cinema: La Princesse de Montpensier
